title: 24 Hour OCE Stream | SLaTerStream | Giveaways & General Badassary

embed.description: Them Gold Feels | OCE Ranked | Songrequests!

body:
Hi Community,

Come and join Slater in his very first 24 hour stream. Viewer music picks and a giveaway towards the end of the stream.

Come help build Slaters stream by following. You support means a lot!!!

Stream starts at 12:00pm (GMT +8) and will run for.. well.. 24 hours.

Look forward to seeing you there!

- Peace {{summoner:12}}
